name: Sugar Cookies
author: Juanita Dannenmueller
instructions: Cream shortening and sugar well. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Gradually blend in dry ingredients which have been sifted together. Chill the dough at least three hours. Roll to 8 or 1/4 inch thickness on a lightly floured pastry canvas. Cut cookies with floured cookie cut- ters. Bake on ungreased cookie sheets at 375Â° for 8 to 10 minutes.
